root.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
root.description: Playing as Harry and other key characters in Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - Part 2 videogame, you are on a dangerous and urgent quest to locate and destroy the remaining Horcruxes, and with them, Voldemort. Break into the high security vaults of Gringotts Bank, escape Fiendfyre in the Room of Requirement and battle Voldemortâ€™s most powerful allies as you defend Hogwarts in this action-packed experience.
